file_content.text: Republic security owes you one. Without the Black Sun's clinic, criminals are stuck with the faces they've got.
The clinic's not taking any more patients. And here are those records you wanted.
Perfect. With them, we can ID those face-swapping thugs.
Thanks again. If we had more Jedi like you working the streets, Black Sun would be a thing of the past.
Nice work, Lieutenant. Coruscant's going to be a cleaner place thanks to you.
Thanks for this. Closing that clinic's a big win for Republic security, and for the people of Coruscant.
Once you bust the Black Sun clinic, we'll round up the patients and lock them up for good.
It's a pleasure, Master Jedi. I'm Officer Stansun, Republic security. Trying to keep peace and order down here.
Hello, Lieutenant. Good to see a fellow defender of the peace. I'm Officer Stansun, Republic security.
Keeping Coruscant clean's a dirty job, but it's good to see I've got company. I'm Officer Stansun, Republic security.
We're fighting a war against the Black Sun. Wish I could say we're winning.
Word has it they're running an illegal surgery clinic, giving wanted criminals new faces. Helps them dodge arrest.
Republic security should end their operation.
Shut them down.
We've tried, but the facility moves shop the second they see our uniforms.
I'm surprised anyone's willing to sacrifice their identity like that.
That's disgusting.
These thugs will do anything to avoid arrest.
I'd never let someone cut this handsome mug.
Must not be as cute as me.
Sure. These brutes only do it 'cause they have to.
I don't care who I'm hiding from, no one messes with my looks.
Must not be as cute as me.
Don't blame you... but none of these thugs have a face like yours to protect.
This clinic concerns me how?
That clinic is a menace and a threat to Coruscant's stability.
More and more dangerous criminals slip through our fingers every day. Unfortunately, they move shop whenever Republic security swoops in.
But maybe you could pay this clinic a visit. Smash their illegal surgery droids, pull their patient files. Show them the Republic's still in charge.
Black Sun's clinic won't operate another day.
Gladly.
Good to hear. The sooner we shut them down, the quicker we can clean up Coruscant.
Maybe I'll visit this clinic.
Republic security appreciates any help you can offer.
Destroy the Black Sun surgery droids then download their patient files. That's all we need to pull the masks off their criminal clients.
No thanks. [Refuse quest]
Sorry to bother you. Looks like Black Sun's getting off easy, for now.
Coruscant's a rough place. It's up to Republic security to protect it.
